game.name: Night Of El Chupacabra
game.desc: "Night of El Chupacabra" is a retro-style arcade shooter set in 1995, where players defend their family from the legendary creature wreaking havoc in the countryside. Featuring 8-bit pixel art and fast-paced gameplay, the game challenges you to survive waves of attacks using quick reflexes and strategic movement. With browser-based and downloadable options, itâ€™s a nostalgic thrill for fans of classic arcade games.
